thread.title: Rains, cloudy weather to continue in UAE
thread.title_full: Rains, cloudy weather to continue in UAE

title: Rains, cloudy weather to continue in UAE
text:
Rains, cloudy weather to continue in UAE   | Last updated on February 22, 2017 at 07.29 am Share 
((Rahul Gajjar/Khaleej Times)) Look out for slight rains as skies will be overcast during the day. After unpredictable showers yesterday morning, the day looks cloudy today with overcast skies. There might be slight rains during the day. The National Center of Meteorology & Seismology (NCMS) has forecasted partly cloudy weather for the UAE with light to moderate northwesterly winds in general. The humidity might increase during the night and early morning over internal and coastal areas with a chance for mist/fog formation. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 22, 2017 The NCMS ended the warning of rough sea in the Arabian Gulf and Oman sea and it will moderate to slight today. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 21, 2017 The weather will be pleasant over the weekend and apt for long drives if showers don't hit the emirates.
